name: Ikea GLADHÖJDEN standing desk
description:
Max. load: 10 kg
Width: 100 cm
Depth: 60 cm
Max. height: 115 cm
Min. height: 72 cm
Used desk, no scratches nor stains. This sit/stand desk doesn't need electricity, so it can be placed anywhere and without messy cables. You can easily adjust the height of the desk between 72 and 115 cm by holding and pinching the handle and then pushing the tabletop up/down until you have the desired position for standing or sitting. The gas spring and the stable steel base allow the desk to be raised/lowered quietly, quickly and safely to a comfortable height. I will cover delivery.

name: Combi Mechacal Handy 4 Cas – Ultra-Light (4.7kg) & Auto-Swivel Wheels
description:
Condition: [e.g., Good 8/10. Cleaned and ready to use.]
The gold standard for lightweight strollers in Singapore. This Combi Mechacal Handy is perfect for parents who travel solo with their baby. It is so light you can carry it up the stairs with one arm while holding your baby in the other!
Premium Features:
• Auto-4 Cas (Swivel Wheels): Smooth 360° steering even when the baby is facing you.
• Ultra-Lightweight (4.7kg): Makes taking the bus or MRT a breeze.
• High Seat (55cm): Keeps baby away from ground heat and closer to you.
• EggShock Technology: Superior vibration absorption for a smoother ride on SG pavements.
• One-Hand Fold: Collapses in a second with a single button.
• Full UV Canopy: Stylish striped/polka-dot lining with mesh windows for ventilation.
Original price was $599.

NOTE: pls pickup from bishan mrt.

name: Foldable Laundry Rack / Drying Rack
description:
The Laundry Drying Rack offers a compact design, straightforward setup, and robust construction, making it ideal for efficient laundry management. Its space-saving slim feature allows it to be folded up against the wall when not in use, perfect for tight spaces. Additionally, the easy installation and solid build quality make it a reliable choice for outdoor or indoor use.

1. Best item for installing in front of windows at indoor such as laundry room, living room.
2. Can save space as it can be folded
3. Doesn’t need to damage your house, no drilling required
4. Easy to install, disjoint by one-touch system
5. Double lock to fix it firmly
5. Wide enough to hang many clothes and blankets
6. Width adjustable steel pipes
7. The high compression spring in the post fixes this rack firmly

name: Mobile Geriatic Chair
description: Mobile Geriatic Chair is a specialized, padded recliner for seniors with limited mobility, offering comfort, stability, and support for activities like eating, reading, or resting, often featuring adjustable positions (recline/footrest), drop arms for easier transfers, and sometimes trays, designed to be more supportive and less clinical than wheelchairs for daily use. They provide a comfortable alternative for those needing help with transitions between sitting and standing, offering stability and safety.
